scoring.web.model module¶

class scoring.web.model.User(id, team, is_admin)[source]¶

Bases: flask_login.mixins.UserMixin

A Flask-Login user.

is_authenticated¶

bool – Is the user authenticated?

is_active¶

bool – Has the account been activated?

is_anonymous¶

bool – Is this an anonymous user?

id¶

str – A unicode identifier for this user

name¶

str – Name of the user

team¶

Team – Team the user belongs to

is_admin¶

bool – Is the user an admin?

get_id()[source]¶

Get the ID of the user.

Returns:A unicode identifier for the user
Return type:(str)

scoring.web.score module¶

scoring.web.score.get_results_list()[source]¶

Collect the results for all teams on each check

Returns:A mapping of team IDs and check IDs to a list of boolean results in chronological order
Return type:Dict(int->Dict(int->List(bool)))
scoring.web.score.uptime(results)[source]¶

Determine the uptime for each check on each team, as well as total uptime.

Parameters:results (Dict(int->Dict(int->List(bool)))) – A mapping of team IDs and check IDs to a list of boolean results in chronological order
Returns:A mapping of team and check IDs to an uptime percentage. Total uptime is stored at check ID zero which is unused.
Return type:Dict(int->Dict(int->float))

class scoring.web.web_model.WebModel[source]¶

Bases: data_model.DataModel

change_passwords(team_id, domain_id, service_id, pwchange)[source]¶

Change the passwords for the given credentials.

Parameters:
  • team_id (int) – The ID of the team the credential belongs to
  • domain_id (int) – The ID of the domain the credential belongs to
  • service_id (int) – The ID of the service the credential belongs to
  • pwchange (str) – A series of user:pass combos separated by CRLFs
change_user_password(username, newpw)[source]¶

Set the given user’s password to the given password.

Parameters:
  • username (str) – The user to change the password for
  • newpw (str) – The new password
get_user_password(username)[source]¶

Get the password hash for the given user.

Parameters:username (str) – The username to get the hash for
Returns:The password hash
Return type:(str)
latest_results()[source]¶

Gather the latest results for each team/check combo.

Returns:A mapping of each team and check to its latest result
Return type:results (Dict(int->Dict(int->(Result))))
load_db()[source]¶

Load all data from the database, including web-specific data.”

load_web_users(teams)[source]¶

Load the web application users from the database.

Parameters:teams (Dict(int->Team)) – Mapping of team database IDs to Teams
Returns:
Mapping of usernames to User objects for users who
can login to the web application.
Return type:Dict(str->User)
